Verify the 'Submit' button is enabled, has background color #007bff, text color #ffffff, font size 16px, padding 12px 20px, border radius 4px, x-coordinate 100, and y-coordinate 250
Verify the 'Username' input field is visible, has placeholder text 'Enter your username', border 1px solid #ced4da, and width 300px
Verify the 'Username' input field border color changes to #80bdff with transition duration 200ms when focused
Verify the 'About Us' navigation link has text color #333333, font family 'Arial', font weight 400, and is positioned at top 20px, left 50px
Verify the 'About Us' navigation link text color changes to #007bff with opacity 0.8 on hover

Verify the 'Promotional Banner' image has source 'banner.png', rendered dimensions 960x300px, natural dimensions 1920x600px, alt text 'Seasonal sale banner', loads within 500ms, and is centered horizontally
Verify the 'Product Price' text element has font size 24px, color #dc3545, and is text aligned right
Verify the product card containing the 'Product Price' has margin 15px and border radius 8px
Verify the video player is visible, initially muted, has width 800px, and height 450px
Click the 'Fullscreen' button
Verify the video player enters fullscreen mode
Verify the video player's 'Play' button becomes active
Verify the error message 'Invalid credentials.' is visible, has text color #dc3545, background color #f8d7da, and padding 10px
Verify the error message 'Invalid credentials.' disappears after 3s via an animation effect with 500ms duration
Verify the 'Notifications' toggle switch is enabled, has value 'true' when active, and background color #28a745 when active
Verify the 'Notifications' toggle switch has opacity 0.6 and cannot be focused when disabled
Verify the first data row in the table has background color #f8f9fa, text color #212529, and font size 14px
Verify the table displays 10 items
Verify the 'Order Date' column shows date values in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format
Verify the 'Login Modal' dialog is initially hidden, appears with a fade-in animation of 300ms, and has width 500px
Verify the 'Login Modal' dialog's close button has aria-label 'Close dialog'
Verify the current page number '3' in the pagination control is selected, has background color #007bff, and text color #ffffff
Verify there are 5 page controls in total, each 32px wide and 32px high
Verify the 'Dashboard' menu item in the sidebar is active, has background color #e9ecef, font weight 600, and is positioned at left 0px, top 80px
Verify the 'Dashboard' menu item's icon has alt text 'Dashboard icon'
Verify the progress bar shows 75% completion, has background color #007bff for the filled portion, total width 400px, height 20px, and its value updates with transition duration 400ms
Verify the user avatar image has source 'avatar.jpg', rendered dimensions 40x40px, border radius 50% (circular shape), loads in less than 100ms, and is visible
Verify the 'Help' button's tooltip is visible on hover, displays text 'Click for assistance', has background color #333333, text color #ffffff, font size 12px, and appears after 200ms delay

Verify the 'Privacy Policy' link in the footer has text color #6c757d, font size 13px, font family 'Open Sans', is text aligned center within the footer, and has href 'https://www.example.com/privacy'
Verify the code block element has background color #f8f9fa, padding 15px, border 1px solid #e9ecef, font family 'monospace', width 600px, text color #343a40, and margin-top 20px
Verify the 'Settings' dropdown menu item is visible when its parent dropdown is open, has height 36px, padding 8px 16px, and background color #ffffff
Verify the 'Settings' dropdown menu item background color changes to #f8f9fa on mouse over
Verify the main content area has height 600px and initial scroll-top is 0px
Verify the 'Back to Top' button becomes visible with opacity 1 when the main content area is scrolled down

Verify the 'Choose File' button associated with the file upload field is enabled, has label 'Upload Document', displays text 'No file chosen' when no file is selected, has width 150px, and height 40px
